mapper.update: create table ${siteId}_hit ( categoryId varchar(30), timeId varchar(11), hit int, avgTime int, maxTime int, primary key (categoryId, timeId) ) ${option}
mapper.select: select categoryId, timeId, hit, avgTime, maxTime from ${siteId}_hit where categoryId = ''
mapper.insert: insert into ${siteId}_hit (categoryId, timeId, hit, avgTime, maxTime) values (#{categoryId}, #{timeId}, #{hit}, #{avgTime}, #{maxTime})
mapper.select: select * from ${siteId}_hit where categoryId=#{categoryId} and timeId=(select max(timeId) from ${siteId}_hit where timeId like '${dFilter}%') limit 1

select sum(hit) as hit, case when sum(hit) = 0 then 0 else ceil(sum(avgTime * hit) / sum(hit)) end as avgTime, max(maxTime) as maxTime from ${siteId}_hit where categoryId=#{categoryId} and timeId between #{from} and #{to}
